pr_title: [Code health] Add dependency health badge to README

timeline.bodyText:
@gino-m @scolsen @dturner
Thoughts on the thresholds of current chosen range?
Current states: Poor[red], Fair[orange], Good[green]
Other considered states:

Poor[red], Fair[orange], Good[light green], Excellent[green]
Bad[red], Poor[orange], Fair[yellow], Good[light green], Excellent[green]
timeline.author: shobhitagarwal1612
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,87 @@
+"""Generates a SVG by parsing json report.
+
+Task dependencyUpdates generates a json report. This script parses that file and
+generates a SVG showing percentage of up-to-date dependencies.
+
+Usage:
+> python cloud-builder/generate_dependency_health_svg.py <path_to_json_report> <output_svg_path>
+"""
+
+import json
+from sys import argv
+
+SVG_TEMPLATE = 'cloud-builder/dependency.svg'
+COLOR_RED = '#E05D44'
+COLOR_ORANGE = '#FFA100'
+COLOR_GREEN = '#43CC11'
+
+
+def get_status_color(health):
+    if health >= 67:
+        return COLOR_GREEN
+    elif 33 < health < 67:
+        return COLOR_ORANGE
+    else:
+        return COLOR_RED

replies.bodyText: I like the last one (5 ranges), since I think the impact of having older dependencies shouldn't be weighted so harshly - this way we'll have more yellow and green, only slipping into orange if we're really out of date.
replies.author: gino-m

timeline.message: Create python script to generate svg from json reports
Run script on cloud-build for all branches
Add check before creating svg and copy plaintext report too
Reuse single template for all cases

timeline.bodyText: This should have Copyright header as well.

timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -105,14 +105,27 @@ steps:
 
         # Update build status if running on master branch
         if [[ "${_PUSH_TO_MASTER}" ]]; then
+
+          # Gradle Dependencies Status
+          if [[ -f "gnd/build/reports/dependencyUpdates/report.json" ]]; then
+            python cloud-builder/generate_dependency_health_svg.py gnd/build/reports/dependencyUpdates/report.json dependency.svg
+
+            # Copy artifacts for Github badge
+            gsutil cp dependency.svg gs://${_CACHE_BUCKET}/dependency.svg
+            gsutil cp gnd/build/reports/dependencyUpdates/report.txt gs://${_CACHE_BUCKET}/dependency.txt
+          fi
+
+          # Build Status
           if [[ $(< build-status.txt) == "fail" ]]; then
             gsutil cp cloud-builder/failure.svg gs://${_CACHE_BUCKET}/status.svg
           else
             gsutil cp cloud-builder/success.svg gs://${_CACHE_BUCKET}/status.svg
           fi
 
-          # Make file public readable

timeline.message: Add more colors for additional granularity
